name: claude-agents-skills-marketplace
description: A curated collection of specialized agents and skills for Claude Code, extending Claude's capabilities with domain expertise and task automation

plugins.name: marketplace-manager
plugins.description: Automates adding new agents and skills to the Claude Code marketplace from staging directory

plugins.name: bug-tracker-resolver
plugins.description: Manages bugs in Bugs.md, performs root cause analysis, creates resolution plans, implements and tests fixes

plugins.name: database-architect
plugins.description: PostgreSQL/Supabase expertise - schema design, query optimization, RLS policies, indexing strategies

plugins.name: documentation-maintainer
plugins.description: Creates and updates READMEs, API docs, user guides, ensures documentation consistency

plugins.name: performance-optimizer
plugins.description: Core Web Vitals, bundle size reduction, runtime efficiency, Next.js optimizations

plugins.name: security-code-scanner
plugins.description: Vulnerability identification, OWASP Top 10 analysis, risk assessment, secure code recommendations

plugins.name: ux-ui-design-expert
plugins.description: UX/UI guidance, information architecture, accessibility (WCAG), responsive design

plugins.name: roadmap-feature-planner
plugins.description: Strategic feature planning, implementation coordination, roadmap tracking

plugins.name: video-integration-specialist
plugins.description: YouTube/Vimeo integration, video player implementation, streaming optimization

plugins.name: tax-preparation
plugins.description: Comprehensive tax preparation and planning for individuals and families. US tax preparation, deduction analysis, document processing, multi-year tax projections

plugins.name: portfolio-analyzer
plugins.description: Investment portfolio analysis, performance metrics, asset allocation, risk assessment, and strategic recommendations

plugins.name: retirement-planner
plugins.description: Retirement readiness assessment, Social Security optimization, withdrawal strategies, Monte Carlo simulations

plugins.name: research-consolidator
plugins.description: Synthesize research from multiple AI models and sources into comprehensive reports with confidence scoring

plugins.name: jr-kraken-18u-navy-lineup
plugins.description: Hockey team lineup generation and game strategy planning for Jr Kraken 18U Navy team

plugins.name: kiro-spec-driven-development
plugins.description: Structured spec-driven development workflow that transforms feature ideas into requirements, design documents, and implementation plans using Kiro methodology
